dcterms:creator: H. B. McMahan
E. Moore
D. Ramage
S. Hampson
dcterms:description: Federated Learning (FL) is a communication-efficient learning algorithm that enables the training of deep networks from decentralized data.
dcterms:title: Federated Learning (FL) Algorithm

dcterms:creator: L. Liu
J. Zhang
S. H. Song
K. B. Letaief
dcterms:description: Hierarchical Federated Learning introduces a tree structure with a cloud server connected to edge servers, which are in turn connected to multiple clients.
dcterms:title: Hierarchical Federated Learning

dcterms:creator: R. C. Geyer
T. Klein
M. Nabi
dcterms:description: Differential Privacy in Federated Learning focuses on protecting client data at the individual level while still allowing for effective model training.
dcterms:title: Differential Privacy

dcterms:creator: R. Hu
Y. Guo
H. Li
Q. Pei
Y. Gong
dcterms:description: Personalized Federated Learning with Differential Privacy aims to tailor models to individual clients while ensuring their data privacy.
dcterms:title: Personalized Federated Learning

dcterms:creator: A. Triastcyn
B. Faltings
dcterms:description: Federated Learning with Bayesian Differential Privacy integrates Bayesian methods into federated learning to enhance privacy guarantees.
dcterms:title: Federated Learning with Bayesian Differential Privacy

dcterms:creator: S. Truex
L. Liu
K.-H. Chow
M. E. Gursoy
W. Wei
dcterms:description: LDP-Fed is a federated learning framework that incorporates local differential privacy to protect client data during training.
dcterms:title: LDP-Fed

dcterms:creator: A. Gasc√≥n
P. Schoppmann
B. Balle
M. Raykova
J. Doerner
S. Zahur
D. Evans
dcterms:description: Privacy-Preserving Distributed Linear Regression focuses on enabling linear regression analysis while ensuring the privacy of the data involved.
dcterms:title: Privacy-Preserving Distributed Linear Regression

dcterms:creator: P. Mohassel
Y. Zhang
dcterms:description: SecureML is a system designed for scalable privacy-preserving machine learning, focusing on secure multi-party computation.
dcterms:title: SecureML

dcterms:creator: W. Zheng
R. A. Popa
J. E. Gonzalez
I. Stoica
dcterms:description: Helen is a framework for maliciously secure cooperative learning for linear models, ensuring robustness against adversarial attacks.
dcterms:title: Helen

dcterms:creator: S. Vlaski
A. H. Sayed
dcterms:description: Graph-Homomorphic Perturbations provide a method for private decentralized learning by utilizing graph structures to enhance privacy.
dcterms:title: Graph-Homomorphic Perturbations
